about_the_game:
It's late autumn, and you've always wanted to visit Eastern Europe. You considered first visiting Transylvania by bus. Due to shoddy maintenance, the coach loses one wheel and plummets into a ravine. After losing your consciousness, you are saved by Denise, a fellow tourist you met on the bus.

Ending up in a seemingly deserted village, you soon meet Princess Carmine and Princess Verdant. Despite being sexy and good-looking, they still give off a creepy vampire vibe. After a rather weird encounter, you find out that their golden apples are getting stolen each night from the foggy cemetery. Each princess suspects the other, and you are intimidated into solving this issue. Yes, this means spending the night in the creepy cemetery and catching whatever entity is stealing the produce.


Two campy princesses, Verdant and Carmine. Tsundere, yandere?! Are they human or vampires?! Play the game to find out.


Two normal female side-chicks that will help you around the adventure:



  • Spooky Transylvania feel
  • Jump scares
  • Immersive atmosphere: animated backgrounds, blinking characters, sounds, music, fully animated sex scenes


  • Choices matter, you need to pay attention to the story


Apart from regular sex, the game features the following fetishes:
  • footjobs
  • rough oral
  • anal
  • supernatural sex positions
  • pregnancy

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a few comic horror scenes (night, fog, ghosts, vampires and other entities) and long, explicit, animated sex scenes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0

name: The Fruit Stealing Girls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Princess Verdant and Princess Carmine, sisters, are torn apart when their cherished golden apples vanish. Accusing each other, they send you to spy on the apple tree. Surrounded by the eerie fog that seems to have a life of its own, you must find out who the ghost is.
